remarks: Consequence of "at most one", using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
rmoi.b $e |- ( x = B -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rmoi.c $e |- ( x = C -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
rmob $p |- ( ( E* x e. A ph /\ ( B e. A /\ ps ) ) -> ( B = C <-> ( C e. A /\ ch ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ps x $.
